casebody.data:
Ronald F. Bozelko
v.
Jean R. D'Albero, Administratrix (Estate of Alfred A. D'Albero), et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2016

Ronald F. Bozelko, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn. App. 902, 135 A.3d 281 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
